Name: Elephant's Graveyard
About the game: Elephant's Graveyard: A short but sweet, arcade horror game. Where you indirectly control Pinkston the pink elephant through a graveyard, with the help of a local crow named Leila. Use apples to lure Pinkston, guiding him carefully between breakable objects, like urns and tombs. Disturbed from their eternal sleep, the undead inhabitants don't take kindly to Pinkston. Use different tactics to save Pinkston from their clutches. Do not break too many urns! It will alert the Engineer, who will chase Pinkston down and drag him out of the level. To unlock the gate to the next level, Pinkston needs to find keymice hiding between the urns. Features: Pink elephant 4 levels to complete Screen-filling boss battle 3 trophies to score each level 2 different endings Lots of stuff to break Banging soundtrack by Clement Panchout
